txt.en: Make your way to Grothum and speak with Taskmaster Bárzqhosh. Ask him for his design for making your sapling grow.

'What is this? Surely, this is some kind of joke. Does Bárzqhosh expect us to farm like the Hill-men?

'Oh, no. Now I understand.'

Cinaid laughs.

'It is a joke. A well-played joke by the Taskmaster. He has some wit.'
Bárzqhosh provided a very strange answer. Go to the plains along the Hoardale where the Thistledown Grazers roam and collect their dung. Use it in the soil to grow your sapling.
Deliver aurochs droppings to Cinaid at Gramsfoot
Cinaid wants you to visit a humiliated Uruk in Grothum. His hope is that the Uruk will find a way to help your sapling. Go to him and ask for his guidance.

'In Grothum, seek out Taskmaster Bárzqhosh. His recent failure can be amended by allowing him to find another solution to our development of your sapling. Ask him for his design for making your creature grow.'
Speak with Bárzqhosh at Grothum for advice
Deliver aurochs droppings to Cinaid at Gramsfoot ([placeholder]/7)
'Go to the plains where the Thistledown Grazes roam. Gather their scat. Crops grow well when fed, and the soil enriched by aurochs droppings grows best.'
